info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 March 2023,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: Most responsive host I have ever meet. It's a great place and not too far from the airport. Caretaker were really helpful and a very nice gentleman. He tried his best to provide good service. I liked the place as it was perfect becholor apartment for us. The place even better, nice and simple, very good and quite and clean place to stay and communication is also good nd host is very cordial and nice person and response time was quick.I wish next time i will book this place again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 January 2023
rating_comment:
There was a mistake in booking date but the host assured me that he will let me stay as per our original booking date.
Other than I had conversation with him over the phone. Kawsar is a gentle man and very friendly person. My younger brother went to inspect the house and he found that it is exactly like the photo. Real nice and quiet place. We are travelling from Australia and I believe that we will enjoy the stay there. From the conversation I had with Kawsar over the phone and other social media, so far I can tell that Kawsar is a lovely person and anyone will enjoy staying at his place . My home town is in the same area where his house is located. The location of his house is very nice and quiet area. Looking forward to meet you soon Kawsar.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 January 2023
rating_comment:
Amazing place to stay for vacation. Kawsar brother was so helpful and responsive. He was always there for any kind of help for us. The place was exactly same as described. I had a great time with my family and relatives in Bangladesh. I will come back again.
Highly recommended.

rating_comment: The host is very responsive. The Geyser was out of order but we can use a gas stove to heat the water. That was the only hassle that we face, otherwise, I recommend that place to stay. Thanks.

rating_comment: When I knew nothing about Bangladesh trip, I booked with kawser. From that time onwards, everything from tickets, conveyance, pickup, guidance, etc was done by kawser. It was like meeting your family person and spending couple of days there.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 November 2019,  路 Stayed one night
